title: 6. Why the World Cup Is an Economist's Dream
description: Steve Levitt talks about why the center cannot hold in penalty kicks, why a running track hurts home-field advantage, and why the World Cup is an economist's dream.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
